welcome_message_body: Welcome to Newark, a city known for its rich cultural diversity, historic sites, and vibrant arts scene. We invite you to explore and experience all that this charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Tom Wahl's Newark
restaurants.description: Tom Wahl's Newark is a burger joint located in Newark.

restaurants.name: Domino's Pizza
restaurants.description: Domino's Pizza is a pizzeria located in Newark.

restaurants.name: Dunkin'
restaurants.description: Dunkin' is a donut shop located in Newark.

restaurants.name: Cross Park

restaurants.name: Subway
restaurants.description: Subway is a sandwich spot located in Newark.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Air Canada, American Airlines, JetBlue, and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines, Spirit Airlines, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Alaska Airlines, JetBlue, and United Airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport is a modern and efficient facility with a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying on private jets, Municipal Airport offers a separate terminal with luxurious lounges and personalized services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily domestic flights, with a few international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
